message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be valuable to you. I'm initially offering it at $20,000.
Hi Alice, $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $10,000 right now.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
Alice,  $17,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $12,000.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.
